name: Balls - The Game
description:
Balls - A Game. An endless game, full of Secrets. Let me know if you achieve all the 24 achievements!

--Instructions--

=> Move mouse up and down to control the line under the ball

=> Help the balls avoid all obstacles

=> Collect coin (power) to glow your balls

=> Have fun...

=> Move the mouse into the button on the bottom to right in the menu to see the best score, click in to see more

Extra - Consider buying me a coffee ☕ before downloading the game!
